data.name: Arxada
data.description:
Arxada, formerly part of Lonza Specialty Ingredients, is a global specialty chemicals business with leading

positions in Microbial Control Solutions (‘MCS’) and Specialty Products Solutions (‘SPS’).

Microbial Control Solutions

MCS addresses six target markets: Hygiene, Home & Personal Care, Paints and Coatings, Crop

Protection, Material Protection and Wood Protection. MCS offers industry-leading regulatory

expertise, a comprehensive portfolio together with a broad range of registrations, which are

critical to maintaining the integrity of its customers’ products.

data.name: Bardac
data.description: Bardac® is a range of antimicrobials with quaternary ammonium compound active ingredients such as Didecyldimethylammonium chloride (DDAC) and/or Didecyl dimethyl ammonium chloride. They are suitable for use in Industrial and Institutional settings such as food processing, Food service, Institutional kitchens, veterinary and healthcare.

data.name: Proxel
data.description: 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3-one or BIT (CAS: 2634-33-5), the primary active ingredient in Arxada's Proxel® range, is widely recognized as one of the most versatile, compatible and trusted broad spectrum preservative solutions available for the Home Care market. Aside from single-active products based on BIT alone, the Proxel® range also encompasses cost-effective and specialist blends with carefully-identified co-actives providing flexibility of choice for difficult-to-preserve systems. Proxel® GXL and Proxel® AQ have been pre-approved by the EPA for use in Safer Choice labeled products and have been reviewed by NSF International’s Sustainability Program. For consumers the Safer Choice logo provides recognition that the product has been evaluated for its effect on the environment and human health. Utilizing ingredients that are considered the safest in their class. Safety without sacrificing quality or performance.

data.name: Barquat
data.description: Barquat® Antimicrobials contain the active substance Alkyl dimethyl benzyl ammonium chloride (ADBAC). The active is a cationic molecule offering good surfactant properties and can be formulated together with non-ionic and/or amphoteric surfactants. ADBAC has a broad antimicrobial efficacy against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, yeast, and enveloped viruses. ADBAC maintains its efficacy across a broad pH-range. Single-active ADBAC products are available at different active concentrations, C-chain distributions and solvent combinations.

data.name: Zinc Omadine
data.description: Zinc Omadine® is the most popular anti-dandruff ingredient in the world offering bactericide-fungicide efficacy in shampoos, conditioners and leave-on products. Lonza’s Zinc Omadine® products have been providing dandruff relief and improved scalp health for over 50 years.

data.name: NUGEN
data.description:
Originally the NUGEN® brand was developed for differentiating Arxada's latest hard surface disinfectant formulation from older and more traditional formulations. Included are novel fast kill, hydrogen peroxide, and no-rinse disinfectant liquid and wipe formulations.

With the transition from the Lonzagard brand, the NUGEN® brand now includes all of Arxada's EPA registered formulated solutions and the entire portfolio of registered surface disinfection formulations.

data.name: Geogard Ultra
data.description: Geogard Ultra® is a patented natural broad spectrum preservative, consisting of a synergistic blend of Gluconolactone (CAS: 90-80-2) and Sodium Benzoate (CAS: 532-32-1). The synergy between these two ingredients makes this preservative unique, allowing for its broad spectrum efficacy. Geogard Ultra® benefits from a wide range of global regulatory acceptance, is easy to formulate and is ECOCERT/COSMOS accepted, NATRUE and Soil Association approved.Often organic acids require a co-preservative or an additional booster to provide an optimal performance, as they are too weak on their own. In this blend, the Gluconolactone (polyhydroxy acid or PHA) works in conjunction with the sodium benzoate to perform as an efficient preservative booster. The gluconolactone works by slowly releasing gluconic acid over time, which helps contribute to the preservation effect.

data.name: VANTOCIL
data.description: Vantocil® IB and Vantocil® TG are aqueous solutions of the powerful antibacterial preservative poly(hexamethylene biguanide) hydrochloride [PHMB], an active offering broad pH tolerance, low foam and good heat stability. Applications are varied, and include surface care, fabric care and automotive care.

data.name: Geogard
data.description: Arxada’s Geogard® line is a product platform, offering a wide variety of single-active and blended preservative solutions, capable of providing effective product protection whilst avoiding use of traditional and/or more controversial chemistries. This line of innovative solutions is further characterized by its provision of products with acceptance by organizations such as ECOCERT, COSMOS, the Soil Association and NATRUE.

data.name: Amphoterge
data.description: A range of amphoteric surfactants that are compatible with most personal care ingredients. Amphoterge™ surfactants, which can be used in salt-free systems, are capable of imparting a full range of foaming characteristics.

data.name: Geogard® 221
data.description: Geogard® 221 preservative is based on a synergistic blend of 2 active ingredients, dehydroacetic acid (DHA) and benzyl alcohol. The product is recognized by major cosmetic, toiletry and fragrance regulatory authorities worldwide for use in cosmetic and personal care products and formulations. Geogard®221 has a broad spectrum activity, is light in color, essentially odorless and easy to formulate in a diverse range of products.INCI Name: Benzyl Alcohol (CAS: 100-51-6), Dehydroacetic Acid (CAS: 520-45-6) and Aqua (CAS: 7732-18-5)Key Benefits of Geogard® 221:Wide range of global regulatory approvalsBroad spectrum protectionECOCERT/COSMOS compliant, NATRUE certified and Soil Association approvedWide applicability/compatibility with key raw materialsEasy-to-use and compatible with most types of cosmetic formulationsBenefit and Labeling Claims:Benefit ClaimsBroad pH StabilityChemical StabilityCompatibilityCost EffectiveLabeling ClaimsCruelty-FreeEnvironmentally FriendlyNon-GMONot Tested on AnimalsOdor-freeSustainableApplications Include:Personal Care — Beauty & CareBaby CareBath & ShowerColor CosmeticsHair CareSkin Care

data.name: Geogard Ultra®
data.description: Geogard Ultra® is a patented, synergistic blend consisting of Gluconolactone (polyhydroxy acid or PHA) and Sodium Benzoate. The synergy between these two ingredients, Gluconolactone and Sodium Benzoate, makes this preservative unique, allowing for its broad spectrum efficacy.Organic acids often require a co-preservative or additional booster to provide an optimal performance, as they are too weak on their own. In this blend, the Gluconolactone works in conjunction with the sodium benzoate to perform as an efficient preservative booster that is also non-GMO. Geogard Ultra®’s Gluconolactone works by slowly releasing Gluconic Acid over time, which helps contribute to the preservation effect.INCI Name: Gluconolactone (CAS: 90-80-2), Sodium Benzoate (CAS: 532-32-1) and Calcium Gluconate (CAS: 299-28-5)Key Benefits of Geogard Ultra®:Wide range of global regulatory acceptanceBroad spectrum activityECOCERT/COSMOS accepted, NATRUE and Soil Association approvedWide applicability/compatibilityEasy to formulateAdded skin moisturization benefitApplications Include:Beauty & CareAP/DeoBaby CareBath & ShowerColor CosmeticsHair CareOral CareSkin CareSun CarePersonal HygieneHand HygieneOther Personal Hygiene ApplicationsWipes, Tissue & TowelLabeling Claims of Geogard Ultra®:Cruelty-FreeEnvironmentally FriendlyHalalNaturalNaturally DerivedNon-GMOOrganicSustainable

data.name: Bardac® 2280

summary.name: Synonyms
items: DDAC, Di-n-decyl-dimethylammonium chloride, Didecyldimethylammonium chloride, Didecyldimethylammounium chloride, Dimethyldidecylammonium chloride, N,N-Didecyl-N,N-dimethylammonium chloride

data.description: Bardac® 2280 Antimicrobial contains the active substance Didecyldimethyl- ammonium chloride (DDAC). The active is a cationic molecule offering good surfactant properties and can be formulated together with non- ionic and/or amphoteric surfactants. DDAC has antimicrobial efficacy against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, yeast, algae and enveloped viruses. High antimicrobial efficacy is maintained even at low temperatures and in the presence of organic soil, such as blood and protein. In formulated products, DDAC is stable over a wide range of pH levels and can be used in a number of applications such as food processing, institutional, veterinary, healthcare areas, home care, product preservation and laundry sanitisers. This “fourth” generation quaternary ammonium compound shows excellent tolerance to hard water and different pH levels.

data.name: Bardac® 22

summary.name: Synonyms
items: DDAC, Di-n-decyl-dimethylammonium chloride, Didecyldimethylammonium chloride, Didecyldimethylammounium chloride, Dimethyldidecylammonium chloride, N,N-Didecyl-N,N-dimethylammonium chloride

data.description: Bardac® 22 Antimicrobial contains the active substance Didecyldimethyl- ammonium chloride (DDAC). The active is a cationic molecule offering good surfactant properties and can be formulated together with non- ionic and/or amphoteric surfactants. DDAC has antimicrobial efficacy against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, yeast, algae and enveloped viruses. High antimicrobial efficacy is maintained even at low temperatures and in the presence of organic soil, such as blood and protein. In formulated products, DDAC is stable over a wide range of pH levels and can be used in a number of applications such as food processing, institutional, veterinary, healthcare areas, home care, product preservation and laundry sanitisers. This “fourth” generation quaternary ammonium compound shows excellent tolerance to hard water and different pH levels.

data.name: Barquat® MB-80
data.description:
Barquat® MB-80 Antimicrobial contains the active substance C12-C16 Alkyl dimethyl
benzyl ammonium chloride (ADBAC). The active is a cationic molecule offering good surfactant properties and can be formulated together with non-ionic and/or amphoteric surfactants. This “first” generation quaternary ammonium compound has antimicrobial efficacy against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, yeast, and enveloped viruses.

data.name: Geogard® 111A
data.description: Geogard® 111A offer reliable anti-fungal efficacy at relatively low product use levels. Geogard® 111A is based on dehydroacetic acid (DHA); These preservatives have a wide range of global regulatory acceptance for many personal care and cosmetic applications. Test data of Geogard® 111A to parabens show higher efficacy and substantially better performance in low to neutral pH formulations.

data.name: Cosmocil® CQ
data.description: Cosmocil® CQ is a broad spectrum, fast-acting antibacterial. A 20% aqueous solution of poly(hexamethylenebiguanide) hydrochloride, also known as PHMB, Cosmocil® CQ is an effective preservative for personal care formulations, active against a wide range of both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

data.name: Bardac® 2240

summary.name: Synonyms
items: DDAC, Di-n-decyl-dimethylammonium chloride, Didecyldimethylammonium chloride, Didecyldimethylammounium chloride, Dimethyldidecylammonium chloride, N,N-Didecyl-N,N-dimethylammonium chloride

data.description: Bardac® 2240 Antimicrobials contain the active substance Didecyldimethyl ammonium chloride (DDAC). The active is a cationic molecule offering good surfactant properties and can be formulated to- gether with non- ionic and/or amphoteric surfactants. DDAC has a broad antimicrobial efficacy against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, yeast, and enveloped viruses. High antimicrobial efficacy is maintained even at low temperatures and in the presence of organic soil, such as blood and protein. In formulated products, DDAC is stable over a wide range of pH levels and is used in a number of applications such as food processing, institutional, veterinary, healthcare areas and medical devices. Single-active DDAC products are available at different active concentrations and solvent combinations.

data.name: Glydant Plus® Liquid
data.description: Glydant Plus® Liquid is a synergistic preservation system that combines two well-known and traditional chemistries for personal care. The combination of DMDM Hydantoin and Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate allow for a dual mode of action, offering broad spectrum efficacy. These chemistries been used in personal care for years. This product contains the same amount of active ingredient as Lonza’s Glydant Plus® but is offered as a liquid form.

featured_products.description: Geogard Ultra® is a patented natural broad spectrum preservative, consisting of a synergistic blend of Gluconolactone (CAS: 90-80-2) and Sodium Benzoate (CAS: 532-32-1).

featured_products.name: Geogard® Boost PHC
featured_products.description: Geogard® Boost PHC delivers a broad spectrum of microbial protection with reduced levels of Phenoxyethanol (CAS: 122-99-6) for creams, lotions, moisturizers and conditioners.

data.heading: A pioneering leader with a powerful legacy

data.name: NUGEN® Citric-Guard Wipes
data.seo_description: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of sellers and buyers every day.

data.name: NUGEN® Citric-Guard Wipes
data.description:
NUGEN® Citric-Guard Wipes are a multifaceted solution that combine an effective, sustainable chemistry active, such as Citric Acid, with a compostable substrate based on viscose.

They contain a solution based on a natural active ingredient that meets the principles of sustainability to drive positive change in our communities.

NUGEN® Citric-Guard Wipes connect science with purpose for a better world. NUGEN® Citric-Guard Wipes are the complete sustainable solution for the Household and Professional markets.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
